mapper.insert: insert into odh_code_manage (REC_NO, ATTRIB_ID, ATTRIB_NAME, ATTRIB_VAL, ATTRIB_EXPLA, ATTRIB_VAL2, ATTRIB_EXPLA2, ATTRIB_VAL3, ATTRIB_EXPLA3, ATTRIB_EXPLA_SHORT, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_IP, REC_INSERT_TIME, DELETE_STATE, UPDATE_NO, UPDATE_IP, REC_UPDATE_TIME) values (#{recNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attribId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribExpla,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribVal2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribExpla2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribVal3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribExpla3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribExplaShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteState,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update odh_code_manage set ATTRIB_ID = #{attribId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_NAME = #{attribName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_VAL = #{attribVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_EXPLA = #{attribExpla,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_VAL2 = #{attribVal2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_EXPLA2 = #{attribExpla2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_VAL3 = #{attribVal3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_EXPLA3 = #{attribExpla3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIB_EXPLA_SHORT = #{attribExplaShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGIN_NO = #{loginNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, LOGIN_IP = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REC_INSERT_TIME = #{recInsertTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_STATE = #{deleteState,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_NO = #{updateNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_IP = #{updateIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REC_UPDATE_TIME = #{recUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where REC_NO = #{recNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select REC_NO, ATTRIB_ID, ATTRIB_NAME, ATTRIB_VAL, ATTRIB_EXPLA, ATTRIB_VAL2, ATTRIB_EXPLA2, ATTRIB_VAL3, ATTRIB_EXPLA3, ATTRIB_EXPLA_SHORT, LOGIN_NO, LOGIN_IP, REC_INSERT_TIME, DELETE_STATE, UPDATE_NO, UPDATE_IP, REC_UPDATE_TIME from odh_code_manage where REC_NO = #{recNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
